item.title: Earlier, the previously strong altcoins experienced a widespread decline, with VINE and ZORA nearing a 50% drop from their all-time highs.
item.description: On August 3rd, based on market data, after the market correction, previously robust altcoins generally experienced a decline. These include:VINE witnessed a daily decline of 29.8% and is now trading at $0.06662.ZORA saw a daily drop of 15.6% and is now trading at $0.05402.ENA saw a daily decline of 9.7% and is now trading at $0.5271.

item.title: pump.fun's Solana Launchpad market share in the last 24 hours has increased to 32.4%, while Letsbonk has dropped to 50%.
item.description: On August 3rd, according to the Jupiter Data Dashboard, in the past 24 hours, within the Solana launchpad market share ranking, the market share of pump.fun increased to 32.4%, while that of Letsbonk decreased to 50.2%.

item.title: 「Brother Big V」 Huang Licheng Liquidates PUMP Long Positions and Fully Exits Spot, Losing a Total of 9.94 Million US Dollars
item.description: On August 3rd, as monitored by Onchain Lens, the "Big Brother Whale" completely liquidated his PUMP long position with a 5x leverage this morning, resulting in a loss of $7.76 million. He also sold off all his PUMP spot holdings, incurring a loss of $2.18 million, bringing his total loss on PUMP to $9.94 million.Currently, he still holds a long position in ETH with a 25x leverage and HYPE with a 5x leverage, with an unrealized loss of $13.5 million. His total profits have decreased from $26 million to $3.8 million.

item.title: Crypto Fear & Greed Index Drops to 53, Market Sentiment Returns to "Neutral" for the First Time in Nearly a Month
item.description: On August 3rd, according to alternative data, the Fear and Greed Index of cryptocurrencies today is 53 (yesterday it was 55), and market sentiment has returned to "Neutral," which is the first time in nearly a month.Note: The threshold of the Fear Index is 0-100, and it includes indicators such as Volatility (25%) + Market Trading Volume (25%) + Social Media Hype (15%) + Market Surveys (15%) + Bitcoin Dominance (10%) + Google Trends Analysis (10%).

item.title: Cryptocurrency total market capitalization has experienced a 24-hour decline of 5.4%, currently standing at $3.72 trillion.
item.description: On August 3rd, based on CoinGecko data, the total cryptocurrency market capitalization has declined by 5.4% within the past 24 hours and currently stands at $3.72 trillion. Additionally, the current market dominance is 60.5% for Bitcoin and 11.1% for Ethereum.

item.title: LuBian Pool was hacked in 2020, losing 127,000 BTC. The hacker still controls the assets and has become the 13th largest BTC holder globally.
item.description: On August 3rd, according to Arkham, the once top-ten global mining pool LuBian experienced a significant security incident in December 2020. A total of 127,426 BTC were stolen. At the current coin price, the stolen BTC is valued at 14.5 billion US dollars, making it the largest Bitcoin theft in history.Arkham stated that LuBian was a Chinese mining pool with mining farms in China and Iran. In May 2020, it controlled nearly 6% of the Bitcoin network's total hashing power, exerting considerable industry influence. The attack took place on December 28, 2020. The attacker is said to have exploited a vulnerability in its private key generation algorithm and successfully stole over 90% of the holdings through brute force. The following day (December 29th), the hacker transferred some of the BTC again, amounting to 6 million US dollars.In addition, LuBian tried to negotiate with the hacker through on-chain OP_RETURN messages, requesting the return of the stolen assets. The official team s

item.title: If Bitcoin surpasses $114,000, the mainstream CEX cumulative short liquidation intensity will reach 603 million.
item.description: On August 3rd, according to Coinglass data, if Bitcoin manages to break through $114,000, the total short liquidation strength of mainstream CEXs will reach 603 million.In contrast, if Bitcoin drops below $112,000, the total long liquidation strength of mainstream CEXs will only be 68.916 million.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not provide the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the precise value of contracts to be liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring clusters, that is, strength.Consequently, the liquidation chart shows the extent to which the price of the underlying asset will be impacted when it reaches a certain level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that the price will experience a more intense reaction due to a liquidity cascade when it reaches that particular level.

item.title: 「Big Brother Whale」 Huang Licheng recently went long, causing him to give back over 20 million US dollars in profits.
item.description: On August 3rd, based on cinder monitoring, Big Brother MaJi Huang Licheng's long position in ETH/HYPE/PUMP this time has nearly returned all the $22.45 million in profits he previously made on ETH and HYPE.Starting from mid-May at $27.5, he began taking a long position in HYPE through spot + futures, and started taking a long position in ETH at $2,654 at the end of May. By late July, his profits had surged to $22.45 million.As the market began to retreat in August, his long positions in ETH/HYPE/PUMP started to lose money, and he has now returned the previous $22.45 million profit and is down to $3.5 million.

item.title: Former Prosecutor in Charge of Trump Case Under Investigation for Alleged Illegal Political Activity
item.description: August 3: As per CCTV News, on August 2 in local time, the Office of the Special Counsel in the United States affirmed that the former Special Counsel Jack Smith, who was in charge of the Trump case, is under investigation for "alleged illegal political activities."Smith was appointed as the Special Counsel in November 2022 and was responsible for investigating and litigating the cases where Trump was alleged to have tried to overturn the 2020 presidential election results and mishandled government confidential documents. Trump faced criminal charges in both these cases. After the 2024 presidential election results were announced, Smith submitted materials to the United States Federal Court and dropped the charges against Trump. In the documents, he stated that the U.S. Constitution demands that criminal proceedings against a president-elect should be terminated before taking office. The Department of Justice made the decision to abandon the litigation process based on this provision

item.title: Bitcoin Miners Have Sold Over 3,000 Bitcoins in the Past Two Weeks
item.description: On August 3rd, according to @ali_charts, Bitcoin miners have sold a total of more than 3,000 BTC in the past two weeks. As of August 1st, the balance of Bitcoin miners has decreased from 1.8098 million BTC on July 16th to 1.80698 million BTC.
